SuperGolfDrivePayoutAndRulesShared.Rule1_15_Payout6_4: After the payout of every round is made, all winning symbols will explode allowing the symbols above them to cascade down for a new round.
SuperGolfDrivePayoutAndRulesShared.Rule1_16_Payout6_5: Additional winning combination will be tallied in every round until no more winning combination can be tallied.
SuperGolfDrivePayoutAndRulesShared.Rule1_18_Payout1_1: Some symbols may occupy 2 to 3 symbols' spaces and each of these symbols will represent as a single symbol during payout calculations.
SuperGolfDrivePayoutAndRulesShared.Rule1_19_Payout1_2: Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except Scatter symbol and Mystery symbol.
SuperGolfDrivePayoutAndRulesShared.Rule1_20_Payout1_3: Wild symbol appears on reels 2, 3, 4 and 5 only.
SuperGolfDrivePayoutAndRulesShared.Rule2_1_Payout2_1: During any spin, some symbols (excluding Wild symbol and Scatter symbol) may have a frame around itself.
SuperGolfDrivePayoutAndRulesShared.Rule2_2_Payout2_2: At every new round after the new symbols have cascaded down, any framed symbol(s) that is involved in a win in the previous round will be transformed into Mystery symbol.
SuperGolfDrivePayoutAndRulesShared.Rule2_3_Payout2_3: During any spin with no winning combination, if there are 3 or more Mystery symbols on the reels, each Mystery symbol will increase the win multiplier by x1 and all Mystery symbols will reveal a randomly selected symbol (excluding Wild symbol, Scatter symbol and Mystery symbol) before wins are paid.
SuperGolfDrivePayoutAndRulesShared.Rule3_1_Payout3_1: 4 Scatter symbols appearing anywhere will trigger the Free Spins Feature with 10 free spins. Each additional Scatter symbol will trigger 2 more free spins.
SuperGolfDrivePayoutAndRulesShared.Rule3_2_Payout3_2: During the Free Spins Feature, any win multipliers collected from the Mystery symbols will remain until the end of the Free Spins Feature.
SuperGolfDrivePayoutAndRulesShared.Rule4_1_Payout4_1: The maximum win amount is %{8000}x of the bet amount.
SuperGolfDrivePayoutAndRulesShared.Rule4_2_Payout4_2: If the total win in the main game or the Free Spins Feature reaches %{8000}x of the bet amount, the spin ends.

SuperGolfDriveRule.Rule1_1: Super Golf Drive is a 6-reel, 6-row video slot featuring mystery symbols with increasing multiplier.

Rule1_2.value: The game is played with 20 base bet for %{576} ways - %{46656} ways, bet level of 1 to 10 and bet size of %{minChip} to %{maxChip}.
Rule1_2.comment: ${minChip} ${maxChip} will be replaced with game specific
Rule1_2.example: The game is played with 20 base bet for %{576} ways - %{46656} ways, bet level of 1 to 10 and bet size of 0.01 to 10.

SuperGolfDriveRule.Rule1_21: Free Spins Feature is played at the same bet size and bet level as the spin that triggered the Free Spins Feature.
